aircraft.value: Wraith Silent - AC-7740-722 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 01/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 03/04/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 02/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 08/04/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 10/04/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
